articles.title: Fatty liver disease: Signs include itchy skin, yellow skin and spiderlike blood vessels - newsconcerns
articles.description: A healthy liver should contain little or no fat, though the NHS estimates up to one in every three people in the UK has early stages of NAFLD, where there are small amounts of fat in their liver. The American liver foundation says that if more than f
